00010 #include "Utility.h"

00012 SEM_ID SolenoidBase::m_semaphore = NULL;
00013 Resource *SolenoidBase::m_allocated = NULL;
00014 
00015 tSolenoid *SolenoidBase::m_fpgaSolenoidModule = NULL;
00016 UINT32 SolenoidBase::m_refCount = 0;
00017 
00018 
00024 SolenoidBase::SolenoidBase(UINT32 slot)
00025     : m_chassisSlot (slot)
00026 {
00027     m_refCount++;
00028     if (m_refCount == 1)
00029     {
00030         // Needs to be global since the protected resource spans all Solenoid objects.
00031         m_semaphore = semMCreate(SEM_Q_PRIORITY | SEM_DELETE_SAFE | SEM_INVERSION_SAFE);
00032         m_fpgaSolenoidModule = new tSolenoid(&status);
00033     }
00034     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00035 }
00036 
00040 SolenoidBase::~SolenoidBase()
00041 {
00042     if (CheckSolenoidModule(m_chassisSlot))
00043     {
00044         if (m_refCount == 1)
00045         {
00046             delete m_fpgaSolenoidModule;
00047             m_fpgaSolenoidModule = NULL;
00048             semDelete(m_semaphore);
00049             m_semaphore = NULL;
00050         }
00051         m_refCount--;
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00061 UINT32 SolenoidBase::SlotToIndex(UINT32 slot)
00062 {
00063     return 8 - slot;
00064 }
00065 
00072 void SolenoidBase::Set(UINT8 value, UINT8 mask)
00073 {
00074     if (CheckSolenoidModule(m_chassisSlot))
00075     {
00076         Synchronized sync(m_semaphore);
00077         UINT8 currentValue = m_fpgaSolenoidModule->readDO7_0(SlotToIndex(m_chassisSlot), &status);
00078         // Zero out the values to change
00079         currentValue = currentValue & ~mask;
00080         currentValue = currentValue | (value & mask);
00081         m_fpgaSolenoidModule->writeDO7_0(SlotToIndex(m_chassisSlot), currentValue, &status);
00082     }
00083 
00084     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00085 }
00086 
00092 UINT8 SolenoidBase::GetAll()
00093 {
00094     if (CheckSolenoidModule(m_chassisSlot))
00095     {
00096         return m_fpgaSolenoidModule->readDO7_0(SlotToIndex(m_chassisSlot), &status);
00097     }
00098     return 0;
00099 }
